TopicTitle: Do I have to do a complete re-install to get the patch?

Articles.Content: Trying to update to 1.0.5. Clicked on "patcher" in games folder and get the "malformed data" error. Does not sync or update. Should I just delete the whole KSP folder and start over?

Yup, the patcher's been broken for a while now.

Should I just delete the whole KSP folder and start over?

Why would you delete it? Just rename your current KSP_win folder and download 1.0.5 separately.
I'd always suggest a fresh install, partly because if you run into other problems and have to ask for help, then it's just one less thing to rule out.

Yup, the patcher's been broken for a while now.

Why would you delete it? Just rename your current KSP_win folder and download 1.0.5 separately.

Then I can have two versions at the same time. Brilliant! Gonna do this.
if you have the game on steam, just make an integrity check in properties if you have bad or missing file messages

I have, like, 5 full versions in my general KSP folder (divided into their own version folders).

I really should start getting rid of some of those...
